entry.title: July 22nd Learn Call
entry.summary: The Weekly call started with introduction of members.
entry.content:
The Weekly call started with introduction of members.

We discussed various topics, including Paul's "building nuclear fusion?" thread on the #random channel. And I also found one related video from Youtube randomly Why Private Billions Are Flowing Into Fusion. It was an excellent documentary, explaining the possibility and needs of fusion energy.

Then we discussed the Node-RED platform and the ease of making complex with them. Zain shared about 'node' that can do computer vision. It was the "node-red-contrib-model-asset-exchange"

Participants

  • Paul
  • Muhammed Zain
  • Salman Faris
  • Vincent
  • jacky.dev

Resource Shared

  • Why Private Billions Are Flowing Into Fusion
  • node-red-contrib-model-asset-exchange

entry.title: July 9th Weekly Call
entry.summary: The Weekly call started by getting to know the ESP-C3 Dev module from DFRobot, and we had great discussions on LoRa, Thread and Matter protocols.
entry.content:
The Weekly call started by getting to know the ESP-C3 Dev module from DFRobot, and we had great discussions on LoRa, Thread and Matter protocols.

Muhammed Zain Shared his wild fire prediction project, which uses LoRa radio communication methods to transfer the information and LoCom, That is build for remote communities for emergency communication. , and Travis shared a project called One Planet Education where the LoCom project can be helpful and shared a similer project called Off-grid LoRa Communicator that similar to LoCom.

Travis then shared about the open thread project and maker youtube channel, and that led the discussion to ESP-NOW Protocol

Participants

  • Akid
  • Travis
  • Paul
  • Muhammed Zain
  • Salman Faris
  • Vincent
  • Gray Hat Guy LLC

Resource Shared

  • https://www.dfrobot.com/product-2566.html
  • https://zainmfd.github.io/FightFire/
  • https://www.youtube.com/c/ThatProject
  • https://github.com/seemoo-lab/openhaystack
  • https://www.haystacktechnologies.com/haystack-for-lora/
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QmvMtgNs9r8
  • http://oneplaneteducation.com/
  • https://youtu.be/-hIDE8acqhQ
  • https://hackaday.io/project/183966-off-grid-lora-communicator
  • https://www.flux.ai/p
